mdRecord.dcterms:title: Circular: Attention is called to a publication just issued from the Power Press of Messrs. Geo. P. Evans & Co., Richmond, entitled Guide for claimants of deceased soldiers
Attention is called to a publication just issued from the Power Press of Messrs. Geo. P. Evans & Co., Richmond, entitled Guide for claimants of deceased soldiers
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Confederate States of America. Department of the Treasury
George P. Evans & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text consists primarily of endorsements by officers of the Treasury Dept., Confederate States of America.

"From the heavy cost of publication, the finest material being used, only a small edition is issued, and those who desire to secure the work should forward their orders promptly. Orders, to insure attention, must be accompanied with the money. Address Geo. P. Evans & Co., Book and Job Printers, Richmond, Va. -- p. 4.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Acquired with a copy of the Guide. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. McGregor Endowment Fund, 2006/2007.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fowler, W. H. (William Henry), 1826-1867--Guide for claimants of deceased soldiers
United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Claims.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Richmond, Virginia, Confederate States of America
